Low-level binding of C++ library

Quick search

Python moduleÂ¶

egglib-py is the Python version of eggLib. It contains a wrapper of the eggLib-cpp library generated using SWIG as well as additional functionalies and a number of pre-implemented applications that can be used directly through the executable script egglib.

The different parts of egglib-py are described in the following sections.

  • Low-level binding of C++ library
    • Data holders
    • Conversion and parsing
    • Analysis of polymorphism
    • Coalescent simulator
    • Approximate Bayesian Computation
    • Random number generator
  • Top-level Egglib components
    • Class Container
    • Class Align
    • Class SequenceItem
    • SSR class
    • TIGR class
    • GenBank class
    • Tree class
  • tools
    • Specific data formats
    • Data analysis
    • Sequence manipulation tools
    • Sequence comparison
    • Tools not (directly) related to sequence data
  • wrappers
    • Hudson’s coalescent simulator
    • NCBI BLAST tools
    • Sequence alignment
    • Tree building and analysis
    • Primer detection
  • simul
    • Simulation function
    • Parameter holder class
    • Specifying mutation model using dedicated classes
  • fitmodel
    • Utilities
    • Prior implementations
    • Demographic model implementations
    • Summary statistics implementations
  • Utils module
  • test
